itunes:title: #5: What is an Intimacy Disorder? - All About Love Addiction, Love Avoidance
title: #5: What is an Intimacy Disorder? - All About Love Addiction, Love Avoidance
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: We talk about two of the ways that our unhealthy attachment can play out in relationships - love addiction and love avoidance. These intimacy disorders play out in predictable patterns that are possible to break by doing our own internal work....
itunes:summary:
We talk about two of the ways that our unhealthy attachment can play out in relationships - love addiction and love avoidance. These intimacy disorders play out in predictable patterns that are possible to break by doing our own internal work.
